description: This API retrieves the status of a shipping document job using the job ID provided

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use. Valid for runtime use and expires in 4 hours

common_parameters.name: shop_id
common_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop APIs.

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Authentication signature for the API call

request_parameters.name: job_id
request_parameters.description: Generated job ID for status tracking and download the Shipping Document

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if an error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if an error happened. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: job_id
response_parameters.description: Generated job ID for status tracking and download the Shipping Document

response_parameters.name: doc_status
response_parameters.description: Generated Shipping Document current status. Available values: PROCESSING, READY, EXPIRE

notes: The documentation includes example requests and responses in multiple formats (PHP, Python, CURL) and error codes which have been included in the structured data. The API appears to be part of a logistics/shipping document management system.
